title: Biomedical InformaticsRoskin Lab
author: Pham; TD; Chng; MH Y; Roskin; KM; Jackson; KJ L; Nguyen; KD; Glanville; J; Lee; Engleman; EG; Boyd; SD
description: The Krishna Roskin Lab integrates immunological data from human samples using computational, bioinformatic, and molecular biology methods to study the adaptive immune system.
